title: Engineer | Kai You
desc: I am Kai You, an Engineer loves surfingÔºÅ
point1: I focus on developing React/Express fullstack application,try to build an application that can give back to society.
point2: I develop a app that can help catching illegal parking in campus in 2020.
point3: I turn all my knowledge into articles , I have a blog that already have more than 10000 views
point4: I also want to be good at managment , I attended a national contest which help enterprise coming up with marketing strategy.
point5: I am a passionate,responsible,hardworking engineer,I believe I can help you solve the problems when it comes to coding
goal1: Learning to become a good fullstack engineer,hope to become more effcient at coding
goal2: Hope to help more enterprise to show their brand value by building awesome website
goal3: After gaining enough experience, I want to develop my own brand to help people who want to become an engineer
experience1: Found my brand Hardco,start to write sideprojects and articles
experience2: National Sun Yat-sen University Master of Information Management Department
experience3: Workout App - 2019 NCU Cliab contest -  Honorable Mention
experience4: Workout App - 2019 International ICT Innovative Service Award- Honorable Mention
testimonial1_desc: When I teamed up with Kai before, I felt his passion for constructing a project. He is really ambitious and creative, and he is willing to put his ideas into action. He is a respective leader.
testimonial2_desc: I worked with Kai for four months on a project, because of his rational and clear-headed mind. Our work was really efficient. Besides, he is really talkative and hilarious,I had a great experience working with him.
testimonial3_desc: Kai is a creative person and his execution is impressive. During our cooperation, he keeps coming up with good ideas, and he is willing to turn his thoughts into action. Overall, we have a great time working together!
